title: Brooklyn Beckham ‘dating actress Phoebe Torrance’ after Hana Cross split
text:
Brooklyn Beckham’s mystery girlfriend revealed (Pictures: Rex/Phoebe Torrance/Instagram)

Brooklyn Beckam is reportedly dating 25-year-old actress Phoebe Torrance, following split from Hana Cross.

According to The Mirror, David and Victoria Beckham’s eldest son has been seeing Phoebe ‘for the last few months’.

Speculation about a new romance came about after the pair were spotted cosying up in the VIP area at the launch party of London’s The Wellington Restaurant & Club last month.

They were reportedly ‘glued to each other’s side all night’ with the 20-year-old putting his arm around his new girlfriend.

Phoebe has had acting roles as Amber Ross in Mandy the Doll as well as Andrea the mermaid in Six Rounds. She’s also an ambassador for Papyrus – a national charity preventing youth suicide – and is vocal about her mental health struggles.

In a tell-all YouTube video on her personal channel last month, she said: ‘I wanted to give a little break down about what I’ve been through.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I developed an eating disorder when I was about 13. It’s a battle that I still face every day.’

Phoebe also revealed she has ‘really bad depression’, anxiety and has struggled with self-harm in the past.

On the latter, she said: ‘It’s something that not many people know about. But I want to do videos like this where I can explain so that others can understand and those who are going through similar situations can feel less alone.’

Brooklyn’s last relationship was with Hana Cross when they first got together back in December 2018.

The couple were last seen together at Wimbledon earlier this year, but were hit with split claims in August, after they stopped sharing pictures of each other on their social media pages.

Brooklyn Beckham was approached by Metro.co.uk for comment.

Need support? Contact the Samaritans For emotional support you can call the Samaritans 24-hour helpline on 116 123, email jo@samaritans.org, visit a Samaritans branch in person or go to the Samaritans website.

description: Brooklyn Beckham is reportedly dating actress Phoebe Torrance
